means: （对钱财等）渴望得到的，贪得无厌的

sentence.Network_en: The most acquisitive firms tend to be engineering groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 最贪得无厌的公司往往是工程队。

sentence.Network_en: In an acquisitive society the form that selfishness predominantly takes is monetary greed.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一个贪婪的社会里,贪财是自私自利的突出表现形式.

sentence.Network_en: We live in an acquisitive society.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们生活在一个物欲横流的社会。

PerfectNetExp.abs: acquisition 获得acquisitive 想获得的acquisitively 贪得无厌地
根据第二段第三句,事实是:人们不坦陈自己的梦想(即指野心)——不像从前一样容易公开承认梦想,以防被人看做是爱出风头的、贪婪的(acquisitive)和庸俗的人。.
acquire v. 获得acquisitive adj. 贪得无厌的；可获利的acquit v. 宣告无罪.
3.3.5 贪婪acquisitive adj. 贪婪的，渴望得到的avarice n. 贪婪，贪财

means.word_mean: 渴望得到的,贪婪的,自私的

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French acquisitif, -ive, from late Latin acquisitivus. from Latin acquisit- 'acquired', from the verb acquirere (see acquire)

entry.tran: 渴望得到的;迫切求取的;贪婪的
entry.def: If you describe a person or an organization as acquisitive, you do not approve of them because you think they are too concerned with getting new possessions.

example.ex: We live in an acquisitive society...
example.tran: 我们生活在一个物欲横流的社会。

example.ex: The most acquisitive firms tend to be engineering groups.
example.tran: 最贪得无厌的公司往往是工程队。

means.word_mean: 1. eager to acquire and possess things especially material possessions or ideas;

sentences.sentence: "an aquisitive society in which the craving for material things seems never satisfied"

auth_sentence.content: More a sort of insatiable acquisitive obsessive-compulsive collective disorder.
auth_sentence.res_content: More a sort of insatiable acquisitive obsessive-compulsive collective disorder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: More a sort of insatiable acquisitive obsessive-compulsive collective disorder.

auth_sentence.content: "One obvious problem would be that if people don't have money they would turn more to acquisitive crime," Ms Willott said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "One obvious problem would be that if people don't have money they would turn more to acquisitive crime," Ms Willott said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "One obvious problem would be that if people don't have money they would turn more to acquisitive crime," Ms Willott said.

auth_sentence.content: In fact, acquisitive companies tend to suffer declining share prices in the near term and rising prices over the longer term.
auth_sentence.res_content: In fact, acquisitive companies tend to suffer declining share prices in the near term and rising prices over the longer term.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In fact, acquisitive companies tend to suffer declining share prices in the near term and rising prices over the longer term.

sentences.en: His acquisitive wife is too fond of money
sentences.cn: 她那贪心的妻子爱财如命。
